The application will help you calculate the amount you owe, or should you after you have made a purchase and do not know who owes whom. 
For example, Oleg spent 125, Alexander - 30.45, Elena - 101.33 and Julia 64.98. The application will calculate the total amount (321.76), the amount that must be paid each (the amount is divided equally among all participants in the list) - 80.44, and individually who should give how much.
	Alexander paid more at 44.56, Oleg should give back 49.99, Elena paid more for 20.89 and Julia should give back 15.46.
	You can add unlimited number of people, share the result via an instant messenger or send an email. Also you can save the result, clear the list, create a new one and later upload the save, add people and make a calculation again.
